The mysterious political donor, Norman Hsu, is in a Colorado jail this afternoon.

An attorney for Norman Hsu says he plans to waive extradition so he can get back to California as soon as possible and face sentencing for the grand theft charge.

Hsu reportedly sent copies of a suicide note to several people last Wednesday, then boarded an Amtrak train headed east.
